headline: Selenium review
description: Selenium is a tool for automating browsers and allows concurrent tesing on a large number of devices spread across the globe. Read our review of Selenium - a browser testing tool.
negativeNotes: Large sums of money and time must be invested to maintain Selenium Grid
Mobile testing not possible without third party tools
positiveNotes: Supports Windows, Linux, macOS and more
Automation workflows can be written in multiple languages (Java, Python, CSharp, Ruby, JavaScript, and Kotlin)
Provides extensive control over networking and data storage

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Browser testing tool
reviewBody: Selenium is a great product for manual and automated testing on a large number of devices. Integrations with other services make it a powerful tool, but latency can be high when live-testing devices and some newer OS releases are not immediately available.
